txt.en:
After encountering and defeating the elusive... arm, Withergrip, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

As you wrest Withergrip's finger-bone from its hand, you hope that this is the last time the troublesome limb will creep from the Barrow-downs and harry the people of Cardolan.

You should bring this trophy to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
Deliver Withergrip's finger-bone to Gaerion in Cardolan

Gaerion can be found at Sírlond in Cardolan.\n\nYou have acquired a trophy from an elusive foe in Cardolan. You should deliver it to Gaerion, a trophy-hunter and lore-keeper of the Dúnedain of Cardolan.
After encountering the elusive... arm, Withergrip, you have claimed a trophy that may be of value to the Dúnedain of Cardolan.

'Hail! Is there something I can help you with?'

Gaerion inspects Withergrip's finger-bone closely, turning it between his fingers.

'If I had not already seen the horrors of the Barrow-wights with my own eyes, I would not have believed you. I know enough, though, and I know even a crawling arm can fell the unwary traveller and warrior alike.

'I shall see to it that this bone is buried beyond the Barrow-downs. You have my thanks!'
